description: Detects suspicious powershell invocations from interpreters or unusual programs Author: Florian Roth. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Suspicious PowerShell Invocation Based on Parent Process
query: ((process.parent.executable:(*\\wscript.exe OR *\\cscript.exe) AND process.executable:*\\powershell.exe) AND (NOT (process.working_directory:*\\Health\ Service\ State\\*)))
